mn49:4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhikkhave, bakaṁ brahmānaṁ etadavocaṁ:

mn49:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhikkhave, māraṁ pāpimantaṁ etadavocaṁ:

mn49:26.1_0: Handa carahi te, mārisa, passa antaradhāyāmī’ti.
mn49:26.2_0: ‘Handa carahi me tvaṁ, brahme, antaradhāyassu, sace visahasī’ti.
mn49:26.4_1: antaradhāyissāmi samaṇassa gotamassā’ti nevassu me sakkoti antaradhāyituṁ.
mn49:26.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhikkhave, bakaṁ brahmānaṁ etadavocaṁ:

mn49:28.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmā ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca acchariyabbhutacittajātā ahesuṁ:
mn49:28.3_1: na ca vata no ito pubbe diṭṭho vā, suto vā,
mn49:28.3_2: añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ mahiddhiko evaṁ mahānubhāvo yathāyaṁ samaṇo gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito.
mn49:28.4_0: Bhavarāmāya vata, bho, pajāya bhavaratāya bhavasammuditāya samūlaṁ bhavaṁ udabbahī’ti.
mn49:29.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā aññataraṁ brahmapārisajjaṁ anvāvisitvā maṁ etadavoca:
mn49:29.2_0: ‘sace kho tvaṁ, mārisa, evaṁ pajānāsi, sace tvaṁ evaṁ anubuddho, mā sāvake upanesi, mā pabbajite;
mn49:29.3_0: mā sāvakānaṁ dhammaṁ desesi, mā pabbajitānaṁ;
mn49:29.5_0: Ahesuṁ kho, bhikkhu, tayā pubbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā lokasmiṁ arahanto sammāsambuddhā paṭijānamānā.

mn49:30.5_0: Na maṁ tvaṁ, pāpima, hitānukampī evaṁ vadesi;
